Use this interface to create a new wallet. \n A passphrase is optional. We recommend that you encrypt your wallet using a passphrase which will ensure maximum security. However, it is important that you save your password in a keystore on your device or write it down somewhere safe. If you loose your passphrase you will not be able to recover your data.
